recipesJson.name: MILK OF THE PEBZ
recipesJson.author: NastyNate
recipesJson.description: The left over milk after a nice bowl of fruity pebs. I think 1% fruity flakes is as high as I will go. Much more and I get straight lemon cereal. Hope you all enjoy!

reviews.text: I think everyone over uses FW fruity flakes. 1â€° is just right to me. Nice recipe, i added a tiny bit off tfa sweetener one drop per 5mls
